name: TraderFall
description:
The game with humor. After beginning play. You need catching gold guardian angels to get score. From time to time difficulty will be up.

Three player:
First have no bonuses and have slow speed.
Second have bonus agile, more speed.
Third have bonus, get more score.

Try to get biggest score IF YOU CAN ! ! !
Or, Can you hold out for more than 30 seconds in HIGTHMARE mode?

But know, the GREEN balloon is a secret. Catch it and test your destiny.

Coming soon:
1. Boss fight
2. Funny (HAPPY or NOT) game endings
